subject: Subject
tipTimetable: The current lesson is dimmed. Below is a slider to select the day of the week.
tipGrades1: On this page you can see the grades for the interval you selected, the default is the current month.
tipGrades2: On the right in the corner there is a button, after clicking on it, you can choose the period for which you want to show grades.
tipTask1: There is a panel at the bottom of the screen.
tipTask4: - click to mark the task as completed (the icon turns red).
tipTasks1: On this page you can view and add the day's homework
tipTasks2:
At the bottom there is a slider that you can move to select the day of the week. 
Also next to the number is a date selection button.
tipTasks3:
After adding tasks you will see cards that can be viewed by swiping to the right and left. 
Double tap on the card will mark the task as completed
tipTasks4: In the right corner there is a filter that allows you what data to show.
